Text: Excuse me, but why are these games ripped i ts- files and not mkv, as they use to be?? My tv cant play that ts format :-( Can m4atyr not chance it back to the mkv- format, please (?) Thanks.
Either mkv or mp4 format- please :-) Ts sucks:-(
Mikkel32 download and run the program "XMedia Recode". It can change the .ts into mkv/mp4 without quality loss.
